projects.name: Invoice Calculator
projects.projectDescription: This project is an invoice calculator which allows users to chose a text rate, calculate VAT and total left and download the invoice as PDF file
projects.learned: How to work with JSON files, html2canvas and jsPDF
projects.future: Extracting PDF file from desired part of the HTML body, wihtout using html2canvas

projects.name: Demo Multiple Table Database
projects.projectDescription: This project is a demo for Cleaner and Customer database, which allows users to see list of cleaners/customers edit, add and delete records, see cleaners schedule and calculate weekly payment
projects.future: work further on the dynamic schedule view

projects.name: Responsive Webside
projects.projectDescription: Webside for the Cleaning Agency - HighLine Domestic Services

projects.name: Jeans Shop
projects.projectDescription: E-Commerce Website. The customer can create personal account or checkout as guest, can select items, view shopping bag, view purchased orders, change account details. There is also admin layout - the admin can delete, edit and create new products, view customer orders, mark order as dispatched and delete shipped orders
projects.future: extend admin layout - give access to customers details and give the guest the oportunety to see purchased order with reference number
